parameters:
\N<Hojiko>...I'm sorry, but I'd like you to refrain from showing your
face here until the day of the match. After all, feelings do
tend to arise...

\N<Hojiko>We've been getting along without any problems until now.
It's difficult to suddenly think of you as an enemy, but I
suppose this is necessary...
\N<Hojiko>...Who could it be? At this hour...
\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, be happy. I've brought you some good news.

\N<Zuuteruka>Yeah, that's why I went out of my way to come to this filthy
shop.
\N<Zuuteruka>Here you go, accept it with gratitude.

\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe... Exactly, that 'could it be'. The date of your
participation in the training soldiers' meeting and your
opponent have been decided.

\N<Zuuteruka>Hey hey, take a good look inside. It might be too early to
despair, you know?

\N<Zuuteruka>See ya, that's the situation. But let me tell you, don't get
any funny ideas about running away, okay? If you try
anything like that, I'll subject you to a torture worse than
death.

\N<Hojiko>Take a good look inside, he says... What's the point of
staring at this...

\N<Hojiko>My opponent is... Segi-san...!? I have to fight... the
lady...!? That's ridiculous...!

\N<Hojiko>The training soldiers' meeting is known as a hellish
tournament held by Ryuda... And I'm to participate in such a
thing...
\N<Hojiko>But... if I win... if I win, of course afterwards...

\N<Hojiko>If you've come for supplies, I'm sorry but I can't help you.
You understand, right? After all, you and I are enemies now.

\N<Segi>Please don't worry about it. If our positions were reversed,
I'm sure I would have done the same.

\N<Hojiko>...I want you to understand. This isn't what I want to do
either.

\N<Hojiko>But to survive in this town, it's necessary. I must...
survive in the Rengun-kai no matter what.

\N<Hojiko>Also... I'm sorry, but until the day of the match, please
refrain from showing your face here. It's just that feelings
get in the way...

\N<Hojiko>We've been getting along without any problems until now.
It's hard to suddenly think of you as an enemy, but I guess
it's necessary...
